title: Lone Wolf And Cub: 4 - Baby Cart In Peril

sources.title: Lone Wolf And Cub 4 Baby Cart In Peril
sources.description: In this distinctly lowbrow entry in the  Lone Wolf and Cub  series, Itto Ogami is hired by the Owari clan to assassinate a tattooed woman who is killing her enemies and cutting off their topknots. Meanwhile, Daigoro is separated from his father when he follows a pair of traveling street performers outside of town.
